name: A life well spent (JinFox)
description:
This game is an entry for the Ludum Dare 44 Jam (72h team game jam)

## What is the game about

The game is about living a boring office life and doing standard office work in order to win money.
What a dull life, eh?

In this game you play a office worker:
1 - Go to the dollar sign to start your task.
2 - Accomplish your task.
3 - Repeat until your life ends.

## How to Play
- WASD to move character
- Click buttons or space to start task
- Move the mouse in minigames or follow instruction to complete tasks

## The team
* Joaquim RENARD "JinFox"(twitter : @JoaquimRENARD)
* Michael LASKOWSKI - Quantum Zen
